name: Golden Thief
description:
My First Game Jam on Mini Game Jam 85 : Gold. Hope you all can enjoy it!

Game name: Golden Thief

Control:

WASD / Direction Arrows = Move
Space = Use Night Vision Goggles (if any)
Left Ctrl / Backspace = Pause

Credit:

Nardo Tsang: Programming, Art
Ricky Chan: Map Design, Art

Introduction:

The golden thief has planned to steal the gold and cutted off the power for a minute.  Can he steal the gold and leave within one mintue without getting caught?  What will happen if the power turns back on?
